text:
Warrel Dane (March 7, 1961 – December 13, 2017) was an American heavy metal singer-songwriter, musician and actor. He was the lead singer for the metal bands Sanctuary and Nevermore. He was a natural baritone, though he was known for his high-pitched vocals with Serpent's Knight and on the first two Sanctuary albums. He was born in Seattle, Washington.
Dane provided the voice of Candynose Twinskins in the musical comedy "Metalocalypse" on Adult Swim.
Dane died of a heart attack on December 13, 2017 in São Paulo, Brazil at the age of 56.
